Desc.entry: The forums are free regular meetings for all voluntary and community organisations in the city, whether new groups seeking funding for the first time or experienced organisations looking to develop their fundraising skills. Meetings usually include presentations from local or national funders or feature topics relevent to voluntary groups, such as how to safeguard children. Details are posted on www.eventsheffield.co.uk and publicised in Funding News (see South Yorkshire Funding Advice Bureau). The Funding Forum is supported by the Voluntary Sector Liaison Team working with the South Yorkshire Funding Advice Bureau and Voluntary Action Sheffield (see separate entries).
